alert.note: Alert for Harding; Northern Meade Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Perkins; Southern Meade Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 23 at 2:36AM MST until February 23 at 11:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Harding County, Perkins County, the Northern Meade County Plains, the Pennington County Plains and the Southern Meade County Plains. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: A wind chill advisory means the combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. If you go outside, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands.

area.areaDesc: Harding; Northern Meade Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Perkins; Southern Meade Co Plains
